timers.header: Create custom timers, control them from {LINK_TRIGGER} and {LINK_OVERLAY} on your stream.
timers.premium_limit:
You created the maximum number of {MAX} timers.
Become premium to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} timers.
Or disable / delete some timers to create new ones.

delete_confirm.title: Delete entry
delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

panel.title: Stopwatch & Countdown
panel.description: Start a Stopwatch or a countdown
panel.hint_timer: You can control this timer with the {CMD} commands
panel.hint_countdown: You can control this countdown with the {CMD} commands

form.param_placeholder_tt:
This value will allow you
to get this entry's value
in any trigger action
form.param_placeholder_default_conflict: This is a reserved placeholder name
form.param_placeholder_conflict: Another timer already uses this placeholder
